description: Variation of conditions 10 and 85 (details of hard landscaping of pedestrianised area of Cowcross Street) of the planning direction for Thameslink granted by the Secretary of State on 22 November 2006 and the joint Secretaries of State for Transport and Communities and Local Government on 17 October 2006.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Details of the hard landscaping works to the proposed pedestrian area of Cowcross Street, as shown on approved drawing FS PA 102/99/D, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority before 31/10/2010. The details shall include: proposed finished levels; vehicle and pedestrian access and circulation areas; hard surfacing materials and pattern; minor artefacts and structures (e.g. furniture, cycle parking, refuse or other storage units, signs, lighting etc.); proposed functional services above and below ground (e.g. drainage power, communications cables, pipelines etc., indicating lines, manholes, supports etc.) and a timetable for implementation. The works shall be implemented in strict accordance with the approved details and so retained thereafter.

REASON: To ensure that pedestrian safety and a high quality street scene are provided and maintained.
